name: Eternal Spirits
description:
Play as Shen, a hero that can swap between 4 elements, to allow him to tackle the platforms ahead of him.

Fire to defeat your enemies.

Wind to be more agile and scale areas you couldn't reach.

Earth to climb walls and using walls as platforms.

Water to swim and walk on water to avoid the dangers below.

Please give the Facebook page a like, if you enjoyed the game and want to see further progress of the game in the future.

Facebook page

Just extract the rar file. and run the exe in the same folder as the Data folder.
